body:
NOT THE OFFICIAL POST

We are looking for players to play in the all star game on Saturday at 7PM BST = 2PM EST. If you can not make this time, PLEASE do not apply. We will be hand picking 24 players as we will be doing more than one map.

Apply in this format: 

  • IGN and Past IGN's:
  • Past teams
  • Are you available?
  • Can you record?
  • Can you cannon?
  • What position is your strongest?
  • What is your Skype?
  • Do you have a mic?
  • Do you have TS3?

Confirmed players so far:
  1. BmB
  2. Tazz
  3. Juanoh
  4. Loo
  5. Emmaye
  6. Jive
  7. Notal
  8. Ihze
  9. Cyclops
  10. Raging
  11. Stimulating
  12. Ingigo
  13. Spoookeh
  14. Budah
  15. Pope
  16. Remy
  17. Zero 
  18. Caiiden
  19. Ciaaran
  20. Robin
  21. 0oO
  22. Iron
  23. MapDev
  24. Sparkz
More information and the official post will be out on Wednesday.

replies.body: I'm sorry, but I do not find public Avicus or OCN fun. If you are to stupid too check my OCN stats and see that first of all I never go on OCN and play public (I play Ranked very rarely) and secondly I don't come on Avicus public either. I don't understand why you're saying that when I play neither I find it very hypocritical of you to say that I can't hold my own in OCN, when I am one of the best offenders on this network (Avicus) and I have been in numerous good OCN teams - in fact if we had this conversation 24 hours ago I was in one of the top 8 teams on the server being Big Dango Family. I never claimed to be active on public Avicus, but neither is any person on any top team really. Why? Because public is shit and boring. It is filled with people who have no idea what their doing and once you play for a while, it gets very boring. That is why I left OCN, Because I found it boring - before I left I was one of the best offenders in the tier 2 teams. I left because it was boring, and I found HCF more interesting. Tl;dr: everyone on the roster I'd say deserves their spot, stop being salty, wtf is "real avicus", Tazz is a way better player than you are, even proportionately, so please don't talk.
